mapper.select: select * from (select auth_idx , auth_name, rank() over(order by reg_date) as rank from project_role where project_idx = #{projectIdx}) where rank=2
mapper.delete: delete from PROJECT_ROLE where PROJECT_IDX = #{projectIdx} and AUTH_NAME = #{authName}
mapper.select: select * from project_role where auth_idx = (select auth_idx from project_member where project_idx = #{projectIdx} and user_idx = #{userIdx})
mapper.insert: insert into project (project_idx, pro_name, invite_code, pro_description) values (sc_proz_idx.nextval, #{proName}, #{inviteCode}, #{proDescription})
